page.title: 08WINTERTON, ATTITUDES
page.content: Most people are satisfied with Winterton because it is friendly. They like the shops but they don't like the dirty people and the litter. You can buy most things in Winterton but there tends to be a wider choice in Scunthorpe. Most people think it is a shame there isn't a market any more. A majority wanted a chemist as the nearest one is in Scunthorpe. Lots of people wanted better sports facilities We already have some tennis courts at the comprehensive and Rangers football field, which are used fairly well. Winterton has more than doubled in size in the past 15 years. There is an argument over whether to have a playing field or not. A recent referendum went against it but not many voted. Bus services satisfy most people. People go to Hull more often now the Humber Bridge has opened.
